title: cultural_data_NGV_App
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=au.com.ngv.ngvapp.
Application Name: NGV App.
Number of Reviews: 12.00.
Application Description: NGV App is your guide to navigating the National Gallery of Victoria's collections, programs and exhibition spaces. Use it to pre-plan your visit, discover more about art and artists, and find your way around the gallery. FEATURES: Audio tours featuring stories and insights from artists and curatorsDaily ‘what’s on’ updates, including current exhibitions, guided tours, programs and eventsMapsBehind-the-scenes video, artist interviews and more... Note:An internet connection is required to access content about artworks and exhibition spaces.When visiting NGV, connect to the NGV-Public wifi for optimal performance.
Number of Characters in Description: 618.00.
Overall Rate: 3.30.
First Page Reviews: worked well. using free WiFi can be slow though very limited app. uninstall. excellent Wished it worked. Buggy, crashes continually on a Pixel.
